references.name: Dr. Tommy Lam
references.comment: Matthew is a very intelligent, determined and self-motivated young person who is capable to work independently to achieve specific tasks. He also showed good potential as team leader to manage complex projects.

references.name: Dr. Marian Choy
references.comment: His active involvement allows him to gain communication skills and other soft skills. Besides, his maturity and genuine passion to share knowledge with others lay a solid foundation in his pursuit of a professional engineer.
